explainability.path_to_improvement: Document how explanations are provided to users affected by AI decisions.

external_accountability.path_to_improvement: Obtain external validation of AI practices or require vendor certifications.

fairness.path_to_improvement: Document bias testing procedures or vendor AI fairness requirements.

governance.findings: Published materials describe an AI Center of Excellence that partners with and monitors AI implementations, identifying use cases, testing solutions, and mitigating risks. These materials also reference a commitment to developing a governance policy for responsible integration and accountability.

relevant_sources.summary: This company-owned blog post about Cardinal Health's AI Center of Excellence provides evidence for **governance**, **oversight**, and **transparency**. The article details the establishment of an AI Center of Excellence that partners and monitors AI implementations, identifies use cases, tests solutions, and mitigates risks, demonstrating operational governance and transparency. Furthermore, it highlights a commitment to developing a governance policy for responsible integration and accountability, and emphasizes a philosophy of human oversight for responsible AI use.
relevant_sources.title: Inside Cardinal Health's AI Center of Excellence

oversight.findings: Published materials describe an AI Center of Excellence that partners with and monitors AI implementations, identifying use cases, testing solutions, and mitigating risks. These materials also reference a philosophy of human oversight for responsible AI use.
oversight.path_to_improvement: Publish override mechanisms, escalation processes, or appeal workflows.

relevant_sources.summary: This company-owned blog post about Cardinal Health's AI Center of Excellence provides evidence for **governance**, **oversight**, and **transparency**. The article details the establishment of an AI Center of Excellence that partners and monitors AI implementations, identifies use cases, tests solutions, and mitigates risks, demonstrating operational governance and transparency. Furthermore, it highlights a commitment to developing a governance policy for responsible integration and accountability, and emphasizes a philosophy of human oversight for responsible AI use.
relevant_sources.title: Inside Cardinal Health's AI Center of Excellence

privacy.path_to_improvement: Document data protection practices for AI systems, including vendor AI data handling.

transparency.findings: Published materials describe an AI Center of Excellence that partners with and monitors AI implementations. This center identifies use cases, tests solutions, and mitigates risks, demonstrating operational transparency.

relevant_sources.summary: This company-owned blog post about Cardinal Health's AI Center of Excellence provides evidence for **governance**, **oversight**, and **transparency**. The article details the establishment of an AI Center of Excellence that partners and monitors AI implementations, identifies use cases, tests solutions, and mitigates risks, demonstrating operational governance and transparency. Furthermore, it highlights a commitment to developing a governance policy for responsible integration and accountability, and emphasizes a philosophy of human oversight for responsible AI use.
relevant_sources.title: Inside Cardinal Health's AI Center of Excellence

summary.overall_findings: Cardinal Health's published materials describe an AI Center of Excellence that partners and monitors AI implementations, an operational practice documented under both transparency and governance. This Center of Excellence also identifies AI use cases, a practice also noted for transparency and governance, and is referenced in policy-level disclosures for oversight. Overall, 3 of 7 evaluated responsible AI pillars have documented evidence, based on a review of 12 publicly available sources. No qualifying public evidence was found for fairness, explainability, and 2 additional pillars.
